ServicesComponent.title: Services
ServicesComponent.text1: The buying and selling of financial instruments are processes that are carried out to transfer rights to assets between a seller and a buyer. These transactions take place in financial markets and can involve different types of instruments such as stocks, bonds, derivatives, currencies, cryptocurrencies and other assets
ServicesComponent.text2: A financial instrument transfer is the process of transferring ownership of financial assets from one person (or organization) to another.Unlike currency conversion, the transfer of financial instruments can cover a wider range of transactions, including the transfer of stocks, bonds, derivatives, other securities, and the cash that is denominated in those instruments.
ServicesComponent.text3: Cash conversion is the process of exchanging one currency for another.This process can take place either in the currency market or as part of various financial services. Conversion may be necessary for making international payments, traveling abroad, investing or doing business in different countries.
ServicesComponent.text4: Brokerage operations are financial and trading activities that a broker performs on behalf of a client.A broker acts as an intermediary between buyers and sellers of financial instruments (stocks, bonds, derivatives, currencies and other assets).It provides its clients with access to the markets and helps them perform various financial transactions. Brokers can work with both retail and institutional clients.

Leader.title: Our Leader
Leader.text1: Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli is an experienced manager and highly qualified specialist in economics and finance. Currently, he holds the position of CEO of Erkindik Finance LLC, where he implements the strategic management of the company, develops financial products and ensures effective interaction with business partners at the national and international levels.
Leader.text2: Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli's education includes a bachelor's degree in Economics from the Plekhanov Russian University of Economics (Moscow). Continuing his professional development, he received a Master's degree in Water Economics from the Tashkent Institute of Irrigation and Agricultural Mechanization Engineers. This academic knowledge became the basis of his analytical and managerial approach in the field of business and finance.
Leader.text3: Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli has held key positions in large enterprises throughout his career: Chief Accountant, Head of the Production and Planning Department, Head of the Department of Economic Development and Modernization. His abilities in financial analysis, cost optimization, and strategic planning allowed him to strengthen and modernize the internal processes in each of the organizations where he worked.
Leader.text4: In the following years, he successfully worked as a chief accountant in manufacturing and trading companies, introducing modern financial instruments and ensuring high transparency of management. Further, Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli moved to the managerial level: in 2021, he became the director of Ricomel Beverages LLC, where he led the development of the product line and entry into new markets. In 2023, he held the position of Commercial Director at Raw Materials Cellulose LLC, where he oversaw export operations and foreign economic activity.
Leader.text5: In 2024, Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli represented the interests of EAST WEST FINANCE CJSC in the Republic of Turkey, strengthening international partnerships and promoting the company's services in foreign markets.
Leader.text6: As CEO of Erkindik Finance LLC, Bazarov Shamshod Abdurasul ugli actively develops corporate strategies, implements innovative financial solutions and ensures the company's sustainable development in a rapidly changing economic environment. His leadership, systematic approach to management and international experience make him a key figure in the development of the region's financial sector.
